class.name: UtilityAIArea3DSearchSpace
class.brief_description: Returns all nodes within an [Area3D] as a search space.
class.description: This node uses an [Area3D] to define the search space. All the nodes that are within or intersecting with the [Area3D] are returned as the search space. The search space uses the [signal Area3D.on_area_entered] and [signal Area3D.on_area_exited] signals to determine which other [Area3D] nodes are intersecting with the set area.

members.member: The areas intersecting or within the set area. Useful when debugging the search space.
